epd_metadata.declared_product: cement products produced by Holcim Ecuador
epd_metadata.third_party_verifier: Geoffrey Guest, Certified 3rd Party Verifier under the CSA group

product_description.company_description: Holcim Ecuador is part of the international Holcim group, a leader in innovative and sustainable construction solutions.
product_description.product_classification: UN CPC Group 3744-Cement or CSI MasterFormat Division 03 30 00 Cast-in-Place Concrete

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules

carbon_emission_context.offsets: 100% of carbon emissions offset through forestry offsets in the Cerro Blanco Protected Forest

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_reused_materials: Detailed in the A1 input table
recycled_materials_handling.module_A1_material_losses: 2% waste factor used throughout the study

data_sources_and_quality.raw_material_transport: Combination of actual mode/distance and ecoinvent default multi-modal market mix distances
data_sources_and_quality.fuel_for_machinery: LPG for moving vehicles, propane calculations with ecoinvent 3.8

data_quality_assessment.precision: Validated by LCA practitioner and 3rd Party Verifier
data_quality_assessment.consistency: Same modeling structure across product systems

additional_info.limitations: This EPD does not support definitive comparisons of environmental performance of specific products.
